attributes.action: Stop all post Brexit payments to the EU
attributes.background:
Leave means leave. The Office for Budget Responsibility (OBR) has estimated that the UK will be paying the 'Brexit divorce bill' until 2064.
 
We demand all post Brexit payments to the EU stop now.
